719201f-a.title: Manhattan: Cooper Park - [Peter Cooper Statue.]
719201f-a.text:
Cooper Park: A view of the Peter Cooper statue located in the
northern part of the triangular plot at the convergence of Third and
Fourth Aves. This figure by St. Gaudens, depicts this philanthropist
as he daily appeared; looking down the Bowery. It was unveiled on
May 29, 1897.
August 12, 1937.
George D. Chinn.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
